variables.label: node-red version tag
variables.description: Check out their docker page for the valid tags @ https://hub.docker.com/r/nodered/node-red/tags

variables.label: timezone
variables.description: Check out this list and use tz database name as value @ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones

instructions.end:
node-red is deployed and available as $$cap_appname. To make it function correctly, you have to enable websocket-support. It would be also a good idea to set basic authentication or modify the node-red settings respectively to the documentation.
IMPORTANT: It will take up to 2 minutes for node-red to be ready. Before that, you might see 502 error page.
